column5: I am looking for a bulk supplier for painted 1/4 ounce weedless jigs. Something like the Lindy veg-e jig or Northland Weed weasel, but not the $1.25 + per jig.
Good luck on this request. I have been looking for something similar for awhile. Will be watching for posts. I started making my own with heavy seven-strand wire for a hook guard. Work pretty good.
